6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah, may Allah be pleased with him, that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:"Whoever catches up with two Rak'ahs of 'Asr prayer before the sun sets, or one Rak'ah of the Subh prayer before the sun rises, has caught it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَدْرَكَ رَكْعَتَيْنِ مِنَ الْعَصْرِ .
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Catches Two Rak'ahs Of 'Asr Prayer
